info.title: API Reference
info.description: OpenAPI for operations on Zilliz Cloud

get.description: List collections in a specified cluster.

parameters.name: collectionNames
parameters.description: An array containing the names of the collections to be listed.

200.description: Returns an list of collections in the specified cluster.

post.description: Creates a collection in the specified cluster.

description.description: An optional description about the collection.

autoId.description: Whether the value of the primary key automatically increments. This parameter applies when **primaryKey** is set to **True** for this field.

description.description: An optional description for the field.

primaryKey.description: Whether this field is the primary key. Once set to true, you can also consider setting **autoID** to **True** to make the values in this field automatically increments.

type.description: The type of the data in this field. Possible values are **

fields.description: The schema of the collection comprising the listed fields.

fieldName.description: The name of the fields to be indexed.

indexName.description: The name of the index file to be generated.

metricType.description: The metric type used in the index process. Possible values are **L2** (Euclidean Distance) and **IP** (Inner product).

indexes.description: An array of fields to be indxed.

shardsNum.description: The number of shards in the collections.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to be created.

dimension.description: The number of dimensions for the vector field of the collection.

parameters.name: collectionName
parameters.description: The name of the collection to be described.

200.description: Returns the specified collection in detail.

description.description: An optional description of the collection.

autoId.description: Whether the primary key automatically increments.

description.description: An optional description of the field.

primaryKey.description: Whether the field is a primary field.

type.description: The data type of the values in this field.

fieldName.description: The name of the indexed field.

indexName.description: The name of the generated index files.

metricType.description: The metric type used in the index process.

load.description: The load status of the collection. Possible values are **unload**, **loading**, and **loaded**.

shardsNum.description: The number of shards in the collection.

post.description: Drops a specified collection. This operation erases your collection data. Exercise caution when perform this operation.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection from which entities will be deleted.

filter.description: The filter used to find matches among all entities for deletion.

post.description: Inserts entities in the specified collection.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to which entities will be inserted.

data.description: An array of entity objects. Note that the keys in an entity object should match the collection schema

200.description: Returns the number of inserted entities and an array of their IDs.

insertIds.description: An array of the IDs of inserted entities.

post.description: Conducts a similarity search in the specified collection.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to which this operation applies.

filter.description: The filter used to find matches for the search

level.description: The precision level of the results can be adjusted using values **1**, **2**, or **3**. Higher precision levels lead to more accurate results but take longer to compute. The default value is 1, which prioritizes speed over accuracy.

limit.description: The maximum number of entities to return.

offset.description: The number of entities to skip in the search results.

outputFields.description: An array of fields to return along with the search results.

{vectorField}.description: The label of this field should be the name of the indexed vector field in the collection. For example, if the name of the indexed vector field is **title_vector**, the label of this field should be **title_vector**.

get.description: Conducts a similarity search in the specified collection.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to which this operation applies.

filter.description: The filter used to find matches for the search

level.description: The precision level of the results can be adjusted using values **1**, **2**, or **3**. Higher precision levels lead to more accurate results but take longer to compute. The default value is 1, which prioritizes speed over accuracy.

limit.description: The maximum number of entities to return.

offset.description: The number of entities to skip in the search results.

outputFields.description: An array of fields to return along with the search results.

filter.description: The filter used to find matches for the search

offset.description: The number of entities to skip in the search results.

outputFields.description: An array of fields to return along with the search results.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to which this operation applies.

outputFields.description: An array of fields to return along with the search results.

id.description: The ID of the entity to be retrieved

cloud-region.description: Indicates the cloud region that accommodates your vector databases.
